prefill_custom_text: fondo limpio, colores neutros, props mínimos, estética premium simple. texturas naturales, sombras coherentes, cero look IA, sin artefactos.

auto_product_desc.title_short: Black Ribbed Crop Top with Heart Print
auto_product_desc.product_description_long: This is a black sleeveless crop top featuring a distinct ribbed knit texture and a classic rounded neckline. The front is decorated with a central red, slightly distressed heart graphic, over which white cursive text spells out 'No Love Only Style'. Along the right side, vertical white text clearly reads 'STYLE&CULTURE', adding a unique detail to the garment.
key_visual_features: White cursive text 'No Love Only Style'
Vertical white text 'STYLE&CULTURE' on the right side
prompt_boosters: Close-up of the red distressed heart design
Highlight white cursive text 'No Love Only Style'
Detail shot of the vertical 'STYLE&CULTURE' inscription
Focus on the ribbed texture of the fabric
